sentence: Rob Portman, Rep. Thomas Massie, the Republican from Garrison who represents Northern Kentucky, and Rep. Warren Davidson, a Republican who represents Butler County just north of Cincinnati, responded with a statement.
author: Scott Wartman
title: Portman sides with McConnell against censure of Cheney, Kinzinger. Where local delegation stands on censure, Jan. 6 fights

sentence: Former Cincinnati City Councilman Phil Heimlich announced Thursday he will challenge U.S. Rep. Warren Davidson in a Republican Primary.
author: Scott Wartman
title: Phil Heimlich to challenge Ohio's Rep. Warren Davidson for Congress; attacks Trump

author: Timothy Evans
title: His father helped save people from choking – now he is trying to save the GOP from Trump

sentence: While Democrats are complaining Republicans are seeking to pass legislation to keep public schools from teaching sex education to elementary school kids, Rep. Warren Davidson, R-Ohio, told Newsmax it is "mind blowing" such laws are even needed.
author: Eric Mack
title: Rep. Warren Davidson to Newsmax: Calls for K-3 Sex Ed 'Mind Blowing'

sentence: Representatives, including Steve Chabot of Cincinnati and Warren Davidson of West Chester, voted last year to overturn the results of a free and fair election for president.
author: Jim DeBrosse
title: The Chaos Theory Behind Ohio’s Redistricting Fiasco
